content: I did not bother to create a poll which I normally do whenever I create a thread about boxing because obviously, we know who is going to win here but for Mayweather followers and critics this is an update on his coming fightWe all know who Mayweather is so get to know his opponent instead.https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10097773-floyd-mayweather-jr-vs-john-gotti-iii-rematch-fight-set-for-week-of-super-bowl-58John Gotti III boxing recordWho is John Gotti III? MMA star is former mobster’s grandsonQuote

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Is there a chance to learn whether the Gambino Family still has the influence? Maybe the promotion wanted us to bet for Floyd which is very obvious that he'd win over someone who has very little experience in boxing. This is a very odd exhibition, this Gotti just wanted to fight someone who is famous but also wanted to display their mob influence. The answer to that question will probably have an effect on the result but just consider this exhibition a scam in the making. What story can you come up with before they even arrange this fight?

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Imagine everyone all-in to Mayweather then Mafia intervened to make this match scripted since this just exhibition match. This is hilarious AF! This kind of match is very tricky to bet on sportsbook because the room for gain is just small while the lose is painful if somehow Gotti win a controversial match.How come this kind of match is still being organized even though this is one-sided. This kind of exhibition match should have a handicap since Mayweather will gonna win all day long if we just compared skills of both fighter.

comments.author: Oasisman
comments.body: I don't know what inspired this 2nd match. Though this is just an exhibition fight, but I don't find any interesting stuff regarding this match (not sure about the other boxing fans). Even with just 40% preparation from Mayweather camp, they could obviously dominate the other guy. I mean there's no contest here, even with just an exhibition match. That drama they have made in the first fight, that wasn't enough to attract more spectators. It's obviously a mismatch, I don't know what's interesting with this fight that they even decided to put a 2nd boring fight, are they going to make another more interesting drama? LOL!

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: cabron on November 24, 2023, 03:18:11 PMWhat story can you come up with before they even arrange this fight?If I'm not mistaken, this is a rematch fight?So they already have the storyline in this fight, and in the first fight, it didn't look good as it was ugly and ended in a mass brawl inside the ring. So for sure there will be a lot of trash talking here again, even during the fight.I don't know why there is to be a rematch in the first place though, I mean having a brawl inside and even outside the arena after the fight is a disgrace. But we all know that this will generate more money as there is hype, but for boxing fans, I'm sure that they will not be interested in this kind of fight.
